author: agile_gsd
title: Very Fun Set!
review:
The Wild Animals set is fantastic! Our daughter received this set as a gift for her 2nd birthday. She's 7 now and still plays with it! Even her engineer grandfather enjoys it.

Our only complaint is that we were limited by the small number of plates. We bought a separate set of coordinating 8x8 and 8x16 plates, which made the set seem more complete. It gave our little animal-loving Lego enthusiast endless possibilities for her Duplo landscapes and tree houses.

It's a pricey set, for sure! But after 5 years of rough handling, all pieces are like new. Definitely worth the investment! When she's ready to give it up, we'll have no trouble selling it for a decent price.
